title: Eugenio Montale - Poesia - 2 - Mondadori
description:

 Ne tengo un capo; ma tu resti sola
 nÃƒÂ© qui respiri nellÃ¢â‚¬â„¢oscuritÃƒÂ .
 Oh lÃ¢â‚¬â„¢orizzonte in fuga, dove sÃ¢â‚¬â„¢accende

 Il varco ÃƒÂ¨ qui? (Ripullula il frangente
 ancora sulla balza che scoscendeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦)
 Tu non ricordi la casa di questa
 mia sera. Ed io non so chi va e chi resta.

The Mondadori recording from 1976, read by Carlo Enrice, Claudio Ritter, Franco Sangermano and the poet himself, to which is added an ABC feature on Montale from 2006. The Mondadori is a well produced documentary. Twenty of the poems are read, interspersed with quotations, interviews, soundscapes and the music of his era (of which he was an expert) Excellent sound from both. Kindly seed.
